Gesper was somewhat confused. He felt that he had to comply 
nonetheless.

Gesper: Alright. For the Tripredacus! (Then to Pacifix) Alright 
Pacifix, I have received new orders. I think our friendship could 
developp into an alliance.
I am Gesper, Tripredacus by birth. Our faction has discovered, some 
stellar cycles (=)) ago the power of the Matrix. From that point in 
our history, we have linked ourselves with it. It has given us many 
gifts, and, in return, we have promised it to expand it knoledges to 
all Transformers. We would prefer to do it without violence, but we 
will not refrain to use violence if that becomes necessary. I know 
what your positions are towards combat, but sometimes, fighting is 
necessary. A blast of energy has been unleashed by a faction unknown 
to us against a base. They have sent a message to everyone on the 
planet. They require us to join or to die. I was asked to tell you all 
this and to get your position on the matter.
